reviewText: My father loved it. The sound and picture was very clear.

I was disappointed first of all that the DVD lacked any form of narration about the event as a whole, or about the participants individually.
In addition, all footage of each corps' set-up and entry onto the field, later followed by the march-off, was not included.  I consider these to be essential elements of the total pageantry of the event when seen in person.....why not present it in the video memento?
